metadata.title: CVE-2015-0857 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cool Projects TarDiff allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commandsvia shell metacharacters in the name of a (1) tar file or (2) file within atar file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0857` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tardiff - 0.1-5~build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tardiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.1-5~build0.16.04.1').
